events.message: I ordered a jacket last week and it arrived too small. I would like to know how I can get a refund or exchange for the correct size.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund because the customer mentioned needing a refund or exchange.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request related to the jacket order.
Hello! I'm here to help you with your jacket. Could you please confirm the order number and the exact size you need?
Could you also provide a photo of the jacket to verify the size issue or any tags that came with it?
Sure, my order number is 12345678 and I received a size M but I actually ordered an L. I have attached photos of the jacket and the label.
Thank you for the details. We can process a refund or send you a size L replacement. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer to get an exchange for the size L please. Thank you for handling this quickly.
We have arranged for the size L jacket to be shipped to you and provided a return label for the size M at no cost.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the size L jacket and everything is now satisfactory with your order.
Since there has been no further response, we will mark this case as closed. Thank you for contacting customer support.
